channel.title: Network Security on Logotyp.us
channel.description: Recent content in Network Security on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Qualys Logo
Qualys, Inc. provides cloud security, compliance and related services and is based in Foster City, California. Founded in 1999, Qualys was the first company to deliver vulnerability management solutions as applications through the web using a “software as a service” model, and as of 2013 Gartner Group for the fifth time gave Qualys a “Strong Positive” rating for these services. It has added cloud-based compliance and web application security offerings.
You can download theQualyslogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Qualys
item.description: Qualys, Inc. provides cloud security, compliance and related services and is based in Foster City, California. Founded in 1999, Qualys was the first company to deliver vulnerability management solutions as applications through the web using a “software as a service” model, and as of 2013 Gartner Group for the fifth time gave Qualys a “Strong Positive” rating for these services. It has added cloud-based compliance and web application security offerings.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Fortinet Logo
Fortinet is an American multinational corporation headquartered in Sunnyvale, California. It develops and sells cybersecurity solutions, including but not limited to physical products such as firewalls, plus software and services such as anti-virus protection, intrusion prevention systems and endpoint security components. Fortinet was founded in 2000 by brothers Ken Xie and Michael Xie. The company’s first and main product was FortiGate, a physical firewall. The company later added wireless access points, sandboxing, and messaging security.
You can download theFortinetlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Fortinet
item.description: Fortinet is an American multinational corporation headquartered in Sunnyvale, California. It develops and sells cybersecurity solutions, including but not limited to physical products such as firewalls, plus software and services such as anti-virus protection, intrusion prevention systems and endpoint security components. Fortinet was founded in 2000 by brothers Ken Xie and Michael Xie. The company’s first and main product was FortiGate, a physical firewall. The company later added wireless access points, sandboxing, and messaging security.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Kaspersky Logo
Kaspersky Lab is a Russian multinational cybersecurity and anti-virus provider headquartered in Moscow, Russia and operated by a holding company in the United Kingdom. It was founded in 1997 by Eugene Kaspersky, Natalya Kaspersky, and Alexey De-Monderik; Eugene Kaspersky is currently the CEO. Kaspersky Lab develops and sells antivirus, internet security, password management, endpoint security, and other cybersecurity products and services. Kaspersky expanded abroad from 2005 to 2010 and grew to $698 million in annual revenues by 2017, up 8% from 2016, though annual revenues were down 8% in North America due to U.
You can download theKasperskylogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Kaspersky
item.description: Kaspersky Lab is a Russian multinational cybersecurity and anti-virus provider headquartered in Moscow, Russia and operated by a holding company in the United Kingdom. It was founded in 1997 by Eugene Kaspersky, Natalya Kaspersky, and Alexey De-Monderik; Eugene Kaspersky is currently the CEO. Kaspersky Lab develops and sells antivirus, internet security, password management, endpoint security, and other cybersecurity products and services. Kaspersky expanded abroad from 2005 to 2010 and grew to $698 million in annual revenues by 2017, up 8% from 2016, though annual revenues were down 8% in North America due to U.
